website_summaries.verdict: Larger-size burp pads with 2 color options that come in a pack of 5.
pros: Made from organic cotton and polyester fleece
Large enough to be used as a light blanket
cons: Although they're machine washable, customers commented that they're best hand-washed

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbency and size
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are nice and the size makes them even better. My baby has severe reflux and spits up ALL the time, sometimes it feels like it’s his whole meal... these burp cloths do a great job absorbing all the fluid and cleaning up the mess. The reason I gave 4 stars is because the inside layer on some of them seem to be balling up a little bit after washing and I can’t get them to lay flat anymore. It’s not a huge deal to me, but I’m not sure how they will fare long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love them but....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. Upon arrival I loved the size and thickness, but after the first wash the insides balled up like other reviews mentioned and they are difficult to straighten out. The material isn’t absorbent either so most of what is spit up onto these just slides off making them pretty ineffective. I am sad because I loved the prints and the size, but in the end it was a waste of money- should have gone with Copper Pearl after all.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Cook

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are a little thicker than what I like normally but they work great to lay on shoulder to keep baby from spitting up on you. Wish they were thinner so that they would go under babies neck a little better but definitely still great burp clothes
customer_reviews.author: misty poole

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Too thick, too wide and won’t stay on shoulder. Lumpy after first wash. Definitely not something I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to help with pet care but the size isn't great and they definitely shrunk in the wash. I like the cotton and designs are good and would be useful for the burp cloth it was designed to be used for but didn't quite work for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: NinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Great burp rags. They are bigger than other burp rags I have so I get less spit up on myself. They aren’t very absorbent so if you aren’t careful, the spit up will just drip off. Other than that I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Winnah winnah !!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on others claiming to be better theses hands down are the best! Full belly upchuck in these and not a spot on me ! Mom freakin win
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad because they are soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: They shrink during wash and the outside layers shrink every time so the inside layers become bumpy. Also, not absorbent and milk stains don't wash out. It's too bad because they are soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are long and can withstand many washes. I recommend them, especially if you have a baby who spits up a lot. The quality of the cloths are really good and the material is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Does not absorb well
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are very soft which I like, but they do not absorb the runny liquid spit up like I feel they should. It just runs right off, it is great for chunky spit up and it keeps you dry underneath. Would like for them to absorb a little better. Even after a couple washes they’re still this way.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Order these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are amazing! My baby spits up alot and they do the job perfectly. Their really wide and long so I dont get anything on me when I use them, also super thick. Packaging was neat and sealed. I really like it when you get an email from a small business owner and they reached out promptly asking if everything was ok. The only downside is this baby is my number done and I wish I would have had them with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and soft
customer_reviews.text: OMG! They are so soft! I would trust buying this brand over and over again. Great stitching. Big in size. Soft for my babies skin. I love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I love the fell and the absorbency of these burp cloths ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fell and the absorbency of these burp cloths and would definitely buy them again and recommend them to others, i would give it a five star rating but I cannot call this a perfect product as it is a drop too narrow for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel durable
customer_reviews.text: My baby is not born yet but I am so excited to use these cloths. They are so soft, have thick layers and will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these yet as I am 8 months pregnant, but they are large and feel like very nice quality. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big.
customer_reviews.text: These were great but after I washed them they didn’t lay down flat.
customer_reviews.author: mbravo

customer_reviews.title: Too Thick
customer_reviews.text: Theses aren’t awful, but they are almost too thick. Would return them if we hadn’t already washed them. I should have spent the extra money for Copper Pearl.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Hasselbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these at my baby shower.. I absolutely LOVE them!! The size it great and they absorb better than the cloth diapers I’d gotten for burp rags. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha McTyre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the minimal print. They’re big and absorbent for normal spot up from baby. I ended up buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie orozco

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and can hold the large quantities my LO spits up. They will shrink just a bit after first wash but they are still plenty large, larger than all other burp cloths I have and the designs are cute. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick. Great quality! I love that they are sized pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: These are great nip cloths! Love the material. They are soft and absorbent!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gorelick

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, these are adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Cute prints and good quality products! These will be great for our new little man when he arrives in just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Elber

customer_reviews.title: Burp cloth
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. They felt very soft and looked like they were made well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: How we’ll burp cloths are made
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths were as advertised. Well made, thick & soft. Bought them for a baby shower so cannot say how absorbent or washable they are. Would buy again for next baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: L Adams

customer_reviews.title: Soft and absorbent!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used them yet, but they are very soft and nice and thick! I tested them with liquids and they are also very absorbent. I can’t imagine they will be anything but perfect! I will probably be stocking up on more.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H
